name: fungicidal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for killing funguses (= organisms that get their food from decaying material or other living things) or preventing them from growing: The disease can be controlled only by the application of expensive fungicidal sprays. The enzymes responsible for the direct fungicidal action remain unknown.
More examplesFewer examplesHelichrysum is anti-inflammatory, fungicidal, and astringent. Tea tree oil is an antiseptic, fungicidal, and insect-repellent oil that also has deodorant properties.Fungicidal control is largely ineffective and there is little evidence of resistance.
